turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order two large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings did you want on those 2 large pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One chicken bacon ranch and the other barbecue chicken and both of them with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your order of 2 large pizzas with thick crust, 1 chicken bacon ranch and 1 bbq chicken both with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i do anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that'll be it for me. Thank you.
